title: Visit the IRL App + Map Your City
description: Head to irl.energy and map your city to earn 100 IRL Points. Use the same wallet you use on Galxe so we can auto-credit your points.

title: Follow Refraction on X
description: Follow Refraction on X to stay updated.

title: Follow Refraction on Instagram
description: Follow @refraction_irl on Instagram to stay tapped in with our latest news, events, and cultural drops.

title: Follow Refraction on Farcaster
description: Follow Refraction on Farcaster to join the conversation about IRL and participate in onchain campaigns.

title: Follow Refraction on Lens
description: Follow Refraction on Lens to connect with our Web3-native community and explore curated drops, events, and culture.

title: Join Refraction Towns
description: Join the Refraction Towns — it's your home base for early access to quests, drops, and announcements about the IRL token launch.

title: Join IRL Telegram
description: Get the latest drops, events, and alpha — straight from our Telegram.

title: Get email updates
